title: Error during site building
body:
### Describe the bug

Sometimes when site is building it throws errors:
```
[15:11:38.730] Error: Not found: /_app/immutable/assets/14-1-f449e159.jpg
[15:11:38.731]     at resolve (file:///vercel/path0/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2472:18)
[15:11:38.731]     at resolve (file:///vercel/path0/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2339:34)
[15:11:38.731]     at #options.hooks.handle (file:///vercel/path0/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2516:59)
[15:11:38.731]     at respond (file:///vercel/path0/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2337:43)
[15:11:38.735] Error: Not found: /_app/immutable/assets/14-2-f608b219.jpg
[15:11:38.736]     at resolve (file:///vercel/path0/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2472:18)
[15:11:38.736]     at resolve (file:///vercel/path0/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2339:34)
[15:11:38.736]     at #options.hooks.handle (file:///vercel/path0/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2516:59)
[15:11:38.736]     at respond (file:///vercel/path0/.svelte-kit/output/server/index.js:2337:43)
[15:11:38.740] file:///vercel/path0/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/core/postbuild/prerender.js:53
[15:11:38.740] 					throw new Error(format(details));
```

### Reproduction

I extracted part of site which I think is source of problem: [https://github.com/kg55kmr/test](https://github.com/kg55kmr/test)
As I said errors not always throws, needs several running vite build.

### Additional Information

I am not sure if it sveltekit or vite bug.
